TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: KSPTV to stream KSP 1.0

Articles.Content:
Sooooo what you're saying SQUAD, is that I need to move house, get mostly unpacked and set up my PC before 7pm BST.....challenge accepted!

Tweety

Never mind today is Friday LOL.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-24T12:39:17Z" title="04/24/2015 12:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 24, 2015</time> by Woodstar**

is there anyway to view this now? was it archived? posted on any other channels? 

How frustrating...

> 
> is there anyway to view this now?

Not without a time machine.

> 
> Saturday at 2PM Eastern Time / 18:00 UTC KSPTV will be showing off version 1.0 of Kerbal Space Program!
Hmmmm,what to do while We wait.....![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)
BTW, does this means that there will be no Squadcast tonight ? :/
Is there a schedule anywhere of who'll be broadcasting when?

> 
> Livestreams of KSP are so awfull to watch, there is no editing or time acceleration. It would be way better to present the new features in a compact video than a few hours livestream thing with bad performance. Twitch is so awfull, i cant watch it without buffering and i have a 128000kbit/sec bandwith.

I don't think anyone said there wouldn't be video. You know all the YouTubers will have videos. This is just a livestream, no reason not to do both.

> 
> BTW, does this means that there will be no Squadcast tonight ? :/

This was announced before Maxmaps said he may or may not have time for Squadcast tonght. I hope there is one, but last I had seen he hadn't confirmed one way or the other.
Got to watch this... Then Danny2462 checking out 1.0
So, because I'm terrible with timezones. The stream starts Saturday, 2015-04-25 18:00:00 UTC. Yes?

> 
> So, because I'm terrible with timezones. The stream starts Saturday, 2015-04-25 18:00:00 UTC. Yes?

Si.............

Damn you daylight savings time! I am going to the movies this evening and I have to leave at 19.45 European time. In Europe we're an hour ahead of the UK, so that means I can watch 45 minutes of the videos, right? Wrong! Now that we're on summer time, Europe is two hours ahead of UTC, not one, and I'll miss the whole thing. How annoying!

Ok it's time, let's go. Not that I'm impatient or anything.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Ok it's time, let's go. Not that I'm impatient or anything.

Ok it's starting.

Fairing is very cool, still breaking into multiple parts

> 
> ...
> Fairing is very cool, still breaking into multiple parts

How do you know? All DasValdez did was show it in the VAB.

So far I like the new parts. Too bad DasValdez himself is annoying as hell.

Serive bay! Fuel cells placed in service bay

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> How do you know? All DasValdez did was show it in the VAB.

You must be delayed by a few seconds or so

- - - Updated - - -

Procedural fairings are very cool.

- - - Updated - - -

edit fairing option. he did not click on it though

No I am not delayed.

The fairings split into multiple parts when he moved his mouse over them. That does **NOT** mean it will split into confetti when it's detached.

Edit:

He's about to lauch his first RIGHT NOW.

Only now we'll see what happens.

Stats with tips : missing ladder! Hatch blocked!

- - - Updated - - -

True. I'm just reporting what I see so far.

- - - Updated - - -

yep, flew off in multiple parts

OK. NOW we know it IS confetti!

Edit:

RIP Valentina Kerman.

Yes. He killed her.

We haven't seen what "edit fairing" does yet

That's true. I stand corrected. All we know now is by default it's confetti.

Fairing remembers shape when removed in VAB. 

Actually no, it has to be re-drawn
I kind of like the way fairings move out of the way when building, kudos to Squad for doing something innovative! Even if it's not the *right* way

big s-wing strake
